ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And certainly] خَلَقْنَا [We created] ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ [man] وَنَعْلَمُ [and We know] مَا [what] تُوَسْوِسُ [whispers] بِهِۦ [to him] نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ [his soul] وَنَحْنُ [and We] أَقْرَبُ [(are) nearer] إِلَيْهِ [to him] مِنْ [than] حَبْلِ [(his) jugular vein] ٱلْوَرِيدِ [(his) jugular vein]
ayahs.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna al-insanawanaAAlamu ma tuwaswisu bihi nafsuhu wanahnu aqrabuilayhi min habli alwareed

ayahs.textUthmani: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِذْ [When] يَتَلَقَّى [receive] ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ [the two receivers] عَنِ [on] ٱلْيَمِينِ [the right] وَعَنِ [and on] ٱلشِّمَالِ [the left] قَعِيدٌۭ [seated]
ayahs.transliteration: Ith yatalaqqa almutalaqqiyaniAAani alyameeni waAAani ashshimali qaAAeed

ayahs.textUthmani: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: مَّا [Not] يَلْفِظُ [he utters] مِن [any] قَوْلٍ [word] إِلَّا [but] لَدَيْهِ [with him] رَقِيبٌ [(is) an observer] عَتِيدٌۭ [ready]
ayahs.transliteration: Ma yalfithu min qawlinilla ladayhi raqeebun AAateed

ayahs.textUthmani: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَجَآءَتْ [And will come] سَكْرَةُ [(the) stupor] ٱلْمَوْتِ [(of) death] بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ [in truth] ذَٰلِكَ [That] مَا [(is) what] كُنتَ [you were] مِنْهُ [[from it]] تَحِيدُ [avoiding]
ayahs.transliteration: Wajaat sakratu almawti bilhaqqithalika ma kunta minhu taheed

ayahs.textUthmani: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَنُفِخَ [And will be blown] فِى [[in]] ٱلصُّورِ ۚ [the trumpet] ذَٰلِكَ [That] يَوْمُ [(is the) Day] ٱلْوَعِيدِ [(of) the Warning]
ayahs.transliteration: Wanufikha fee assoori thalikayawmu alwaAAeed

ayahs.textUthmani: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَجَآءَتْ [And will come] كُلُّ [every] نَفْسٍۢ [soul] مَّعَهَا [with it] سَآئِقٌۭ [a driver] وَشَهِيدٌۭ [and a witness]
ayahs.transliteration: Wajaat kullu nafsin maAAaha sa-iqunwashaheed

ayahs.textUthmani: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: لَّقَدْ [Certainly] كُنتَ [you were] فِى [in] غَفْلَةٍۢ [heedlessness] مِّنْ [of] هَـٰذَا [this] فَكَشَفْنَا [So We have removed] عَنكَ [from you] غِطَآءَكَ [your cover] فَبَصَرُكَ [so your sight] ٱلْيَوْمَ [today] حَدِيدٌۭ [(is) sharp]
ayahs.transliteration: Laqad kunta fee ghaflatin min hathafakashafna AAanka ghitaaka fabasarukaalyawma hadeed

ayahs.textUthmani: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَقَالَ [And (will) say] قَرِينُهُۥ [his companion] هَـٰذَا [This] مَا [(is) what] لَدَىَّ [(is) with me] عَتِيدٌ [ready]
ayahs.transliteration: Waqala qareenuhu hatha maladayya AAateed

ayahs.textUthmani: أَلْقِيَا فِى جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَلْقِيَا [Throw] فِى [in (to)] جَهَنَّمَ [Hell] كُلَّ [every] كَفَّارٍ [disbeliever] عَنِيدٍۢ [stubborn]
ayahs.transliteration: Alqiya fee jahannama kulla kaffarinAAaneed

ayahs.textUthmani: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: مَّنَّاعٍۢ [Forbidder] لِّلْخَيْرِ [of good] مُعْتَدٍۢ [transgressor] مُّرِيبٍ [doubter]
ayahs.transliteration: MannaAAin lilkhayri muAAtadin mureeb

ayahs.textUthmani: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ
ayahs.wordByWord: ٱلَّذِى [Who] جَعَلَ [made] مَعَ [with] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] إِلَـٰهًا [a god] ءَاخَرَ [another] فَأَلْقِيَاهُ [so throw him] فِى [in(to)] ٱلْعَذَابِ [the punishment] ٱلشَّدِيدِ [the severe]
ayahs.transliteration: Allathee jaAAala maAAa Allahiilahan akhara faalqiyahu fee alAAathabiashshadeed

ayahs.textUthmani: ۞ قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: ۞ قَالَ [Will say] قَرِينُهُۥ [his companion] رَبَّنَا [Our Lord] مَآ [not] أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ [I made him transgress] وَلَـٰكِن [but] كَانَ [he was] فِى [in] ضَلَـٰلٍۭ [error] بَعِيدٍۢ [far]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala qareenuhu rabbana maatghaytuhu walakin kana fee dalalinbaAAeed

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He will say] لَا [(Do) not] تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ [dispute] لَدَىَّ [(in) My presence] وَقَدْ [and indeed] قَدَّمْتُ [I sent forth] إِلَيْكُم [to you] بِٱلْوَعِيدِ [the Warning]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala la takhtasimooladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bilwaAAeed

ayahs.textUthmani: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلْقَوْلُ لَدَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
ayahs.wordByWord: مَا [Not] يُبَدَّلُ [will be changed] ٱلْقَوْلُ [the word] لَدَىَّ [with Me] وَمَآ [and not] أَنَا۠ [I Am] بِظَلَّـٰمٍۢ [unjust] لِّلْعَبِيدِ [to My slaves]
ayahs.transliteration: Ma yubaddalu alqawlu ladayya wamaana bithallamin lilAAabeed

ayahs.textUthmani: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: يَوْمَ [(The) Day] نَقُولُ [We will say] لِجَهَنَّمَ [to Hell] هَلِ [Are] ٱمْتَلَأْتِ [you filled] وَتَقُولُ [And it will say] هَلْ [Are] مِن [(there) any] مَّزِيدٍۢ [more]
ayahs.transliteration: Yawma naqoolu lijahannama hali imtala/tiwataqoolu hal min mazeed

ayahs.textUthmani: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَأُزْلِفَتِ [And will be brought near] ٱلْجَنَّةُ [the Paradise] لِلْمُتَّقِينَ [to the righteous] غَيْرَ [not] بَعِيدٍ [far]
ayahs.transliteration: Waozlifati aljannatu lilmuttaqeena ghayrabaAAeed

ayahs.textUthmani: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: هَـٰذَا [This] مَا [(is) what] تُوعَدُونَ [you were promised] لِكُلِّ [for everyone] أَوَّابٍ [who turns] حَفِيظٍۢ [(and) who keeps]
ayahs.transliteration: Hatha ma tooAAadoona likulliawwabin hafeeth

ayahs.textUthmani: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: مَّنْ [Who] خَشِىَ [feared] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ [the Most Gracious] بِٱلْغَيْبِ [in the unseen] وَجَآءَ [and came] بِقَلْبٍۢ [with a heart] مُّنِيبٍ [returning]
ayahs.transliteration: Man khashiya arrahmanabilghaybi wajaa biqalbin muneeb

ayahs.textUthmani: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُلُودِ
ayahs.wordByWord: ٱدْخُلُوهَا [Enter it] بِسَلَـٰمٍۢ ۖ [in peace] ذَٰلِكَ [That] يَوْمُ [(is) a Day] ٱلْخُلُودِ [(of) Eternity]
ayahs.transliteration: Odkhulooha bisalamin thalikayawmu alkhulood

ayahs.textUthmani: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: لَهُم [For them] مَّا [whatever] يَشَآءُونَ [they wish] فِيهَا [therein] وَلَدَيْنَا [and with Us] مَزِيدٌۭ [(is) more]
ayahs.transliteration: Lahum ma yashaoona feehawaladayna mazeed
